sn23.22:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "‘nirodhadhammo, nirodhadhammo’ti, bhante, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, bhante, nirodhadhammo"ti?
sn23.22:2: Māro ca māradhammo ca,Aniccena apare duve;Dukkhena ca duve vuttā,Anattena tatheva ca;Khayavayasamudayaṁ,Nirodhadhammena dvādasāti.
